original_title: Trains delayed on main and coastal lines
original_body_lines: Train services operating on the main and coastal lines have been delayed owing to a derailment near the Colombo Fort Railway Station.

Accordingly, trains operating on the said routes will be delayed after a train plying from Colombo Fort to Matara derailed near the Presidential Secretariat in Colombo this evening (06 July), the Sri Lanka Railways Department reported.
